scripts.compile-dev: npm run dev && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.final: npm run compressed && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.compile-reset: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url true scss/reset/c-reset.scss scss/compiled/reset.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r scss/compiled/reset.css
scripts.compile-base: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url scss/base/c-base.scss scss/compiled/base.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r scss/compiled/base.css
scripts.compile-components: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url scss/components/c-components.scss scss/compiled/components.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r scss/compiled/components.css
scripts.compile-full: node-sass --output-style compressed --omit-source-map-url scss/legos.scss scss/compiled/lego.css && postcss -u --no-map autoprefixer -r scss/compiled/lego.css
